author: A_Brickset_user
title: The PC version is much better.
review: This game is not good, it's very hard to. It's hard to grab power-ups, because you can't see when they come. The same at the road, it's hard to see when the turns come. The graphic are the badest with the game. The road are almost the same at every track, just another background. Do not buy this game.
